refbody.section: PurposeDisplay CPU utilization over the past 10 seconds, 1 minute, 10 minutes, 1 hour, and 1 day intervals.

ExampleDisplay CPU utilization.Console> status cpu-utilization CWZBR02384I: CPU utilization over time: CWZBR02767I: 0% over 10 seconds CWZBR02768I: 49% over 1 minute CWZBR02769I: 25% over 10 minutes CWZBR02770I: 14% over 1 hour CWZBR02771I: 6% over 1 day Console>
